Submodules¶

wethebestOLS.ols.ols module¶

This is THE BEST ols.

param y

N by 1 response vector

type y

np.array((N, 1), float64)

param X

N by K covariate matrix

type X

np.array((N, K), float64)

returns

  • beta (np.array((K, 1), float64)) – OLS coefficients

  • se (np.array((K, 1), float64)) – standard errors of the coefficients

Module contents¶

wethebestOLS.ols.ols(y, X)¶

This is THE BEST ols.

Parameters

  • y (np.array((N, 1), float64)) – N by 1 response vector

  • X (np.array((N, K), float64)) – N by K covariate matrix

Returns

  • beta (np.array((K, 1), float64)) – OLS coefficients

  • se (np.array((K, 1), float64)) – standard errors of the coefficients
